thread.title: Incredible Park View at Metropolitan Tower in La Sabana, For Rent or Sale
thread.title_full: Incredible Park View at Metropolitan Tower in La Sabana, For Rent or Sale

author: Mariana
title: Incredible Park View at Metropolitan Tower in La Sabana, For Rent or Sale
text:
A/C: Yes 
Metropolitan Tower 
Located in front of La Sabana Park on the eighth floor, 263 square meters, master suite, three bedrooms (or convert a bedroom into an office), three bathrooms, TV room, laundry room, and quality design spaces, including living room, dining room and modern kitchen with Viking appliances and terrace with a beautiful view of the park. 
Sale price: $850,000
